com.percussion.extensions.general
Class PSTouchContentAndParentItems

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSDefaultExtension
      com.percussion.extensions.general.PSTouchContentAndParentItems
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSRequestPreProcessor
public class PSTouchContentAndParentItems
extends PSDefaultExtension
implements IPSRequestPreProcessor

This pre-exit recursively looks up 0 or more (active assembly) parent items of a given content. The content itself and 0 or more of its parents are then touched so that the LastModifyDate contains the current date & time.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vitaly

Method Detail

preProcessRequest

public void preProcessRequest(Object[] params,
                              IPSRequestContext request)
                       throws PSParameterMismatchException,
                              PSExtensionProcessingException
main pre-exit method that the server invokes, passing run-time parameters

Specified by:
preProcessRequest in interface IPSRequestPreProcessor
Parameters:
params - all parameters are optional, index[0] - this optional param allows to pass a content id, which has to be touched along with its parent items (default is looked up from the request object, key='sys_contentid'); index[1] - this optional parameter can be used to limit a number of parents a user would like to be touched (the default value is set as 'unlimited') In case if index[1] receives a negative number the exit assumes 'unlimited'.
request - server contructed request object
Throws:
PSParameterMismatchException
PSExtensionProcessingException

init

public void init(IPSExtensionDef def,
                 File codeRoot)
          throws PSExtensionException
Description copied from class: PSDefaultExtension
This is a default implementation that does nothing except save the input values in protected local storage for use by derived classes.

See init for details.

Specified by:
init in interface IPSExtension
Overrides:
init in class PSDefaultExtension
Parameters:
def - The extension def, which contains configuration info and initialization params.
codeRoot - The root directory where this extension should install and look for any files relating to itself. The subdirectory structure under codeRoot is left up to the extension implementation. Must not be null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the codeRoot does not exist, or is not accessible. Also thrown for any other initialization errors that will prohibit this extension from doing its job correctly, such as invalid or missing properties.
